title: Finding the Inverse Matrix
text: We must find the inversee of the coefficient matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} -3 & -4 \\ 12 & 4 \end{bmatrix}$$, which is $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{9} & \frac{1}{9} \\ \frac{-1}{3} & \frac{-1}{12} \end{bmatrix}$$.

title: Multiplying the constant matrix and the coefficient matrix.
text: We must now multiply $$\begin{bmatrix} 9 \\ -6 \end{bmatrix}$$ by $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{9} & \frac{1}{9} \\ \frac{-1}{3} & \frac{-1}{12} \end{bmatrix}$$. This gives us $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{1}{3} \\ \frac{-5}{2} \end{bmatrix}$$. Our answer is $$(\frac{1}{3},\frac{-5}{2})$$
